Rarespawn_Reward_1HDagger_Scorpion.flavor:
"The scorpion Nine-Eyes is known as "The Terror of the Sands" for good reason. Her tail can pierce the strongest armor, and her poison melts flesh in seconds."
- Field Notes of an Unknown Iron Wolf
Rarespawn_Reward_1HDagger_Scorpion.name: Broodmother's Stinger

Rarespawn_Reward_1HFocus_Succubus.flavor: Even removed from the demon's body, the eye continues to weave its hypnotic patterns.
Rarespawn_Reward_1HFocus_Succubus.name: Qin's Captivating Eye

Rarespawn_Reward_1HMace_BanditMelee.flavor: The handle of this white-hot mace bears soot marks in the shape of a clenched fist.
Rarespawn_Reward_1HMace_BanditMelee.name: Mace of Blazing Furor

Rarespawn_Reward_1HSword_KnightMelee.flavor:
"While the origins of this accursed blade are lost to time, there is no question that wielding its dark power leaves an indelible stain on one's soul." 
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Rarespawn_Reward_1HSword_KnightMelee.name: Darkblade

Rarespawn_Reward_1HWand_Ghost.flavor:
"So skilled was Abe-Mari at divination, they predicted the date of their own death; a skill that proved so ruinous that no mage since has attempted the feat."
- Excerpt from Secrets of the Mage-Clans
Rarespawn_Reward_1HWand_Ghost.name: Wand of Abe-Mari

Rarespawn_Reward_2HSword_MegaDemon.flavor: This massive sword's edge grows keener and its promises of power grow louder with each life taken.
Rarespawn_Reward_2HSword_MegaDemon.name: Infernal Edge

Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_DrownedSpecial.flavor:
"Even after he was put to death, some children swore they could still hear his bell ringing softly in the breeze on moonless nights."
- Greenslade's Tales, Chapter 5: "The Myth of Blind Odwyn"
Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_DrownedSpecial.name: Blind Man's Bell

Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_GoatmanMelee.flavor: This vile necklace of charred goat's teeth paradoxically contains both the power to extend life as well as cut it short.
Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_GoatmanMelee.name: Necklace of Inevitability

Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_SnakeCaster.flavor:
"A foul spell of desire was woven into the statue's stone. Its idolaters were helpless as their souls were ripped from their bodies to animate its writhing form."
- Field Notes of Brother Darmont
Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_SnakeCaster.name: Eye of Enkil

Rarespawn_Reward_Boots_SkeletonMelee.flavor:
"The Captain was bleeding from at least three bite wounds, sweating from the poison and barely able to walk, but he never stopped searching for his lost comrades."
- Eulogy for Captain Willcocks
Rarespawn_Reward_Boots_SkeletonMelee.name: Captain's Ragged Boots

Rarespawn_Reward_Chest_CannibalBrute.flavor:
"Favored by Pitiless Gur, this heavy armor remains painfully cold to the touch, even in the hottest of climates."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Rarespawn_Reward_Chest_CannibalBrute.name: Gur's Freezing Armor

Rarespawn_Reward_Crossbow_GhostMelee.flavor:
"Those who came before shall bear witness to your deeds."
- Inscription on the hilt
Rarespawn_Reward_Crossbow_GhostMelee.name: Haunted Crossbow

Rarespawn_Reward_Gloves_OmniMonk.flavor: Those foolish few Monks who abuse their training for personal gain are banished from the Floating Sky Monastery and forced to wander the harsh and unforgiving lands beyond.
Rarespawn_Reward_Gloves_OmniMonk.name: Outcast's Handwraps

Rarespawn_Reward_Helm_BarbarianGhost.flavor:
"There is nothing better in life than to stand alone, painted red, atop a hill made from the bodies of your enemies."
- Zarozar the Mighty
Rarespawn_Reward_Helm_BarbarianGhost.name: Bloodspiller's Helm

Rarespawn_Reward_Pants_WerewolfMelee.flavor: Wearing these gore-drenched leggings fills your mind with a single overwhelming desire: to hunt.
Rarespawn_Reward_Pants_WerewolfMelee.name: Manhunter's Breeches

Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_BloodLord.flavor:
"Unhand me, filth! A single drop of my blood is worth an ocean of yours! Within it churns a power you could never hope to understand!"
- Lord Eònan, last words
Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_BloodLord.name: Blood-Cursed Band

Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_FlyHost.flavor:
"Dearest Will, this ring is like my love for you. Both have no end. May this ring keep you safe and help keep me in your heart during your travels. - Lucya"
- Inscription on the band
Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_FlyHost.name: Trembling Ring

Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_WoodWraith.flavor: Even the slightest touch leaves painful splinters burrowed in the flesh.
Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_WoodWraith.name: Ring of Splintered Wood

Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_ZombieBrute.flavor: A malformed collection of bone, flesh and a strange, hardened ichor, this ring-shaped object almost seems to have been grown, rather than crafted.
Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_ZombieBrute.name: Grotesque Loop

Rarespawn_Reward_Staff_CultistCaster.flavor: A powerful relic once belonging to Jazreth the Summoner, this staff was thought lost forever.
Rarespawn_Reward_Staff_CultistCaster.name: Staff of Elemental Command

1HAxe_Unique_Generic_001.desc: Lucky Hit: When you Critically Strike an enemy you have up to a 100.0% chance to Fear and Slow them by {40/75}% for 4.0 seconds.
1HAxe_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: A nightmarish amalgam of blood, bone and steel, this axe is as horrific, and as deadly, as its creator.
1HAxe_Unique_Generic_001.name: The Butcher's Cleaver

1HSword_Unique_Generic_001.desc: Lucky Hit: Up to a {15/25}% chance to deal 350 Shadow damage to surrounding enemies and reduce their damage done by 20.0% for 3.0 seconds.
1HSword_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: Whenever this ancient sword has reappeared throughout history, it portends a time of great strife, as well as a devastating loss of life.
1HSword_Unique_Generic_001.name: Doombringer

2HSword_Unique_Generic_001.desc:
Increases your Critical Strike Damage by x{60/100}%.

The other properties on this weapon can roll higher than normal.
2HSword_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: An unbroken lineage of unwavering strength.
2HSword_Unique_Generic_001.name: The Grandfather

Amulet_Unique_Generic_100.desc: Gain 100.0% Maximum Resource. In addition, when you take damage, drain {3/6} Resource for every 1.0% of Life you would have lost instead.
Amulet_Unique_Generic_100.flavor:
"Do not allow your passions to become obsessions. Fuel the fire that burns within you, but it is madness to allow yourself to become ash to please an uncaring universe."
- Last words of Master Selig
Amulet_Unique_Generic_100.name: Melted Heart of Selig

Boots_Unique_Generic_001.desc: You leave behind a trail of frost that Chills enemies. You deal x{7/10}% more damage to Chilled enemies.
Boots_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: Remorseful devotees of the Cathedral of Light must undertake a grueling pilgrimage, journeying across the frigid glacier known as the Serac Rapture. Only then may their gravest sins be forgiven.
Boots_Unique_Generic_001.name: Penitent Greaves

Chest_Unique_Generic_100.flavor: Crafted by the cannibal Armoda, each piece of this interlocking armor has been sharpened into a knife's edge. Even a century after death, the plate remained on her corpse, unable to be removed safely.
Chest_Unique_Generic_100.name: Razorplate

Gloves_Unique_Generic_002.desc: Your attacks randomly deal 1% to {200/300}% of their normal damage.
Gloves_Unique_Generic_002.flavor:
"Will you let fear cheat you, or will you risk everything to find understanding? After all, death is simply the coin with which we purchase life."
- Zurke
Gloves_Unique_Generic_002.name: Fists of Fate

Gloves_Unique_Generic_003.desc: Lucky Hit: Up to a {15/25}% chance to Freeze enemies for 2.0 seconds.
Gloves_Unique_Generic_003.flavor: A touch so frigid it stops the heart and chills the very soul.
Gloves_Unique_Generic_003.name: Frostburn

Helm_Unique_Generic_001.desc: Lucky Hit: Up to a {10/20}% chance to trigger a poison nova that applies 1125 Poisoning damage over 5.0 seconds to enemies in the area.
Helm_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: The horrific whispers of the Maiden of Anguish flicker through your mind, pushing you ever closer to madness...
Helm_Unique_Generic_001.name: Andariel's Visage

Helm_Unique_Generic_002.desc:
Gain {5/8}% Damage Reduction.
In addition, gain +2.0 Ranks to all Skills.
Helm_Unique_Generic_002.flavor:
"This headdress was once worn by an assassin disguised as a court mage. Her treachery was unveiled, but not before she used its magic to curse the king's entire lineage."
- The Fall of House Aston
Helm_Unique_Generic_002.name: Harlequin Crest

Pants_Unique_Generic_100.desc: Effects that Heal you beyond 100.0% Life grant you a Barrier up to {50/100}% of your Maximum Life that lasts for 30.0 seconds.
Pants_Unique_Generic_100.flavor:
"The revelation that master tailor Callas was in fact a witch only served to further fuel the desire for her uniquely enchanted legwraps."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Pants_Unique_Generic_100.name: Temerity

Ring_Unique_Generic_100.desc: If a Core Skill hits 5.0 or more enemies, {20/40}% of the Resource cost is refunded.
Ring_Unique_Generic_100.flavor:
"Every tome, every scroll, every book in this temple produces the same answer. The only being willing to stand against the Eternal Conflict, against the Prime Evils, was Lilith."
- Elias
Ring_Unique_Generic_100.name: Mother's Embrace

Ring_Unique_Generic_101.desc: Each consecutive Core Skill cast reduces the Resource cost of your next Core Skill by {5/10}%, up to a maximum of 30.0%.
Ring_Unique_Generic_101.flavor:
"Yours is the power to pluck the stars from the heavens with the ease of a child gathering fruit from the bough."
- Unknown
Ring_Unique_Generic_101.name: Ring of Starless Skies

desc_extra.Mod.FocusTarget: Command your skeletons to unleash powerful attacks on an enemy and then focus it for 6 seconds.

Necromancer_CommandSkeletons.name: Command Skeletons

Necromancer_Golem.desc:
Passive: You are protected by a Golem with {#} Life that attacks for {35/38.5/42/45.5/49/52.5/56/59.5/63/66.5}% damage.

When your Golem dies, it respawns after 20 seconds.

desc_extra.SF_16_2: The Golem sheds Corpses as it takes damage.
desc_extra.SF_16_3: Active: Your Golem becomes Unstoppable and Taunts Nearby enemies and takes 30% reduced damage for the next 6 seconds.
desc_extra.SF_17: The Golem absorbs 15% of damage you would take, and recovers Life when attacking.
desc_extra.SF_17_2: Active: Your Golem becomes Unstoppable and drains the blood of enemies in the area, dealing {40/44/48/52/56/60/64/68/72/76}% damage and healing {4/4.4/4.8/5.2/5.6/5.9/6.3/6.7/7.1/7.5}% of its Life for each enemy drained. Damage and healing received are tripled if only one enemy is drained.
desc_extra.SF_18: Active: Command your Golem to go to the targeted area, they become Unstoppable and slam their fists into the ground, dealing 25% damage and Stunning surrounding enemies for 3 seconds.  This has a [(NecroArmy_Spec_For_Pet_Type#2==2 and 10 or 16)] second cooldown.

Necromancer_Golem.name: Golem
Necromancer_Golem.rankup_desc: Life increased to {#}. Attack damage increased to {35/38.5/42/45.5/49/52.5/56/59.5/63/66.5}%.

Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_Sacrific.desc: Your Maximum Life is increased by x10%, but you lose the ability to summon a Golem.
Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_Sacrific.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_UpgradeA.desc: Your Blood Golem absorbs 15% of damage you would take.
Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_UpgradeA.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_UpgradeB.desc: While Healthy, your Blood Golem gains 25% Damage Reduction and x50% increased damage.
Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_UpgradeB.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_Sacrifice.desc: You gain +10% increased Attack Speed, but you lose the ability to summon a Golem.
Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_Sacrifice.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_UpgradeA.desc: Each time your Bone Golem takes up to 20% of its Maximum Life as damage, it sheds a Corpse.
Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_UpgradeA.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_UpgradeB.desc: Your Bone Golem gains 10% Maximum Life and the amount of Thorns they inherit from you is increased from 30% to 50%.
Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_UpgradeB.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_Sacrifice.desc: You deal x30% increased Critical Strike Damage, but you lose the ability to summon a Golem.
Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_Sacrifice.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_UpgradeA.desc: Every 5th Iron Golem attack causes a shockwave, dealing 16% damage to the primary enemy and to enemies behind them.
Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_UpgradeA.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_UpgradeB.desc: Your Iron Golem's slam attack also makes enemies Vulnerable for 3 seconds.
Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_UpgradeB.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_RaiseSkeleton.desc:
Raise a Skeleton from a Corpse to fight for you.

Once all of your Skeletons have been summoned, Raise Skeleton briefly summons a Skeletal Priest to empower your Minions for 5 seconds, increasing their damage by 20% and healing them for 10% of their Maximum Life.
Necromancer_RaiseSkeleton.name: Raise Skeleton

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Sa.desc: You deal x15% increased damage to Vulnerable enemies, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Mages.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Sa.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Up.desc: Each time your Cold Mages damage enemies with their primary attack, you gain 2 Essence.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Up.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Up.desc: Enemies who are Frozen by or damaged while Frozen by your Cold Mages' primary attack are made Vulnerable for 3 seconds.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Up.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.desc: Your Overpower damage is increased by x30%, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Mages.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.desc: Reduce the Life cost of your Bone Mages' attacks from 15% to 10%. After being alive for 5 seconds, Bone Mages deal x40% increased damage.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.desc: Each time a Bone Mage dies from its own attack, they leave behind a Corpse and Fortify you for 11% of your Base Life.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.desc: Your maximum Essence is increased by 15, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Mages.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.desc: Shadow Mage attacks have a 10% chance to Stun for 2 seconds. This cannot happen on the same enemy more than once every 5 seconds.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.desc: Shadow Mages fire an additional shadow bolt every 6th attack.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.desc: You gain 15% Non-Physical Resistance, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Warriors.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.desc: Every 8 seconds your Skeletal Defenders negate the next instance of Direct Damage they would take.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.desc: Increase the amount of Thorns that Defender Warriors inherit from you from 30% to 50%.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.desc: You deal x10% increased Shadow Damage, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Warriors.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.desc: Reaper attacks against enemies who are Immobilized, Slowed, Stunned, or Vulnerable reduce the cooldown of their powerful wind-up attack by 2 seconds.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.desc: Reapers have a 15% chance to carve the flesh off enemies, forming a Corpse.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.desc: Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by +5%, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Warriors.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.desc: You can raise one additional Skirmisher Warrior.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.desc: Each time you Critically Strike, your Skirmishers Warriors' next attack Critically Strikes and deals x50% bonus Critical Strike damage. Can only happen every 3 seconds.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.name: Upgrade B

Legendary_Necro_121.desc:
Bone Storm and Blood Wave are also Darkness Skills, deal Shadow damage, and gain additional effects:
• Enemies damaged by Bone Storm take {80/110} Shadow damage over 2.0 seconds.
• Blood Wave desecrates the ground it travels over, dealing {1280/1760} Shadow damage over 4.0 seconds
Legendary_Necro_121.name: of Ultimate Shadow

Legendary_Necro_122.desc: Blood Mist triggers Corpse Explosion on surrounding Corpses. When Blood Mist detonates a Corpse, its Cooldown is reduced by {0.5/1.5} seconds.
Legendary_Necro_122.name: of Explosive Mist

legendary_necro_002.desc: Each time one of your Summoning Minions damages an enemy, they gain +{10/14}% Attack Speed for 3.0 seconds, up to +{30/42}%.
legendary_necro_002.name: of Frenzied Dead

legendary_necro_003.desc: After Decompose spawns a Corpse, gain {10/20} Essence.
legendary_necro_003.name: Flesh-Rending

legendary_necro_012.desc: Bone Spear's primary attack makes enemies hit beyond the first Vulnerable for {1.5/2.5} seconds. Bone Shards from Bone Spear deal {50/100}% bonus damage to Vulnerable enemies and pierce them.
legendary_necro_012.name: Splintering

legendary_necro_016.desc: Bone Prison spawns a pool of Blight that deals {50/100}% bonus damage over 6.0 seconds.
legendary_necro_016.name: of Plunging Darkness

legendary_necro_017.desc: Blight's defiled area, when spawned, Pulls in enemies around the affected area.
legendary_necro_017.name: of the Void

legendary_necro_020.desc: Decompose can chain up to 2.0 additional targets. When Decompose spawns a Corpse, it has a {30/60}% chance to spawn a Corpse under all afflicted targets.
legendary_necro_020.name: Rotting

legendary_necro_022.desc: Critical Strikes from Sever have a {10/20}% chance to spawn a pool of Blight under the target that deals {20/60}% bonus damage. This effect can only happen once every 3.0 seconds.
legendary_necro_022.name: of Empowering Reaper

legendary_necro_023.desc: Every 10.0 seconds, your Cold Skeletal Mages cast a blizzard that deals {250/300} Cold damage and continuously Chills enemies for 8% over 6.0 seconds.
legendary_necro_023.name: Coldbringer's

legendary_necro_028.desc: Blood Lance deals x{15/25}% increased damage to its primary target per lanced enemy.
legendary_necro_028.name: Blood Seeker's

legendary_necro_029.desc: When Blood Lance hits an enemy that is already lanced, it has a {10/20}% chance to fire a Blood Lance at a Nearby enemy.
legendary_necro_029.name: of Hungry Blood

legendary_necro_031.desc: Your maximum number of Skeletal Mages is increased by 2.
legendary_necro_031.name: Viscous

legendary_necro_032.desc: Blood Mist leaves a trail that lasts for 4.0 seconds and deals {75/100} Shadow damage per second to enemies who stand in it. Your Movement Speed is no longer reduced while Blood Mist is active.
legendary_necro_032.name: Blood-soaked

legendary_necro_036.desc: Bone Spirit deals increased damage based on distance traveled, up to x{15/25}%.
legendary_necro_036.name: of Swelling Curse

legendary_necro_038.desc: When a segment of Bone Prison is destroyed or expires, it deals {11/15} damage in an area around itself.
legendary_necro_038.name: of Bursting Bones

legendary_necro_053.desc: While Army of the Dead is active, your Minions gain +{70/100}% Attack Speed and take 90% reduced damage.
legendary_necro_053.name: Unyielding Commander's

legendary_necro_054.desc: Each time that Bone Storm damages an enemy, gain a Barrier equal to {2/5}% of your Base Life for 10.0 seconds.
legendary_necro_054.name: of Shielding Storm

legendary_necro_066.desc: Gain +{10/20}% increased Critical Strike Chance for 6.0 seconds when you cast Corpse Tendrils. You deal x{30/60}% bonus Critical Strike Damage to enemies damaged by Corpse Tendrils.
legendary_necro_066.name: of Grasping Veins

legendary_necro_067.desc: Your maximum number of Skeletal Warriors is increased by 2.
legendary_necro_067.name: Blood Getter's

legendary_necro_100.desc: Critical Strikes with Bone Skills increase your Essence Regeneration by x{20/30}% for [Affix."Affix Value 0"] seconds.
legendary_necro_100.name: of Torment

legendary_necro_101.desc: The Ossified Essence Key Passive also increases the Critical Strike Damage of your Bone Skills by +1.0% per Essence above 50.0, up to +{30/40}%.
legendary_necro_101.name: of Serration

legendary_necro_102.desc: Bone Storm consumes up to 8 Corpses to increase its duration by up to {4/8} seconds.
legendary_necro_102.name: Osseous Gale

legendary_necro_103.desc: Lucky Hit: Up to a 10.0% chance to generate {30/50} Essence when hitting a Vulnerable enemy with your Bone Skills.
legendary_necro_103.name: of Exposed Flesh

legendary_necro_104.desc: You deal x{50/120}% increased damage for 6.0 seconds after the Shadowblight Key Passive damages enemies 10.0 times.
legendary_necro_104.name: Blighted

legendary_necro_105.desc: Enemies afflicted by your Iron Maiden have a {15/25}% chance to be Stunned for 1.0 second when they deal direct damage.
legendary_necro_105.name: Torturous

legendary_necro_106.desc: You deal x{30/40}% increased Shadow Damage to enemies afflicted by both Decrepify and Iron Maiden.
legendary_necro_106.name: of the Damned

legendary_necro_107.desc: Each time the Shadowblight Key Passive deals damage to enemies, it increases the next Shadowblight's damage within 10.0 seconds by x{20/40}%, stacking up to 5.0 times.
legendary_necro_107.name: of Decay

legendary_necro_108.desc: Blood Surge's nova echoes again after a short delay, dealing x{60/70}% less damage.
legendary_necro_108.name: Blood-bathed

legendary_necro_109.desc: Blood Wave fires two additional waves, each dealing x{50/60}% less damage than the previous.
legendary_necro_109.name: Tidal

legendary_necro_110.desc: Blood Orbs reduce your Ultimate Cooldown by {0.5/1} seconds.
legendary_necro_110.name: Fastblood

legendary_necro_111.desc: Whenever your Blood Skills Overpower you gain +{20/50}% Attack Speed for 4.0 seconds.
legendary_necro_111.name: of Rathma's Chosen

legendary_necro_112.desc: Each percent of your Maximum Life you Heal beyond 100.0% grants you +0.5% bonus Overpower damage on your next Overpowering attack, up to a {20/60}% bonus.
legendary_necro_112.name: of Untimely Death

legendary_necro_113.desc: While at full Life, Blood Orbs grant {10/20} Essence.
legendary_necro_113.name: of Potent Blood

legendary_necro_114.desc: Your Golem has a {10/30}% chance to reduce its active Cooldown by 2.0 seconds and a {5/15}% chance to spawn a Corpse each time it damages an enemy with its normal attack.
legendary_necro_114.name: Hulking

legendary_necro_115.desc: While you have 7.0 or more Minions, your Minions gain {15/20}% increased Damage Reduction.
legendary_necro_115.name: of Hardened Bones

legendary_necro_116.desc: Your Sacrifice bonuses are increased by {15/25}%.
legendary_necro_116.name: Sacrificial

legendary_necro_117.desc: You gain {3/5} Maximum Essence per active Minion.
legendary_necro_117.name: Requiem

legendary_necro_118.desc: Your Skeletons gain increased damage while alive, up to x{20/30}% after 10.0 seconds.
legendary_necro_118.name: of Reanimation

legendary_necro_119.desc: Consuming a Corpse increases the damage of your next Core Skill by x{5/10}%, up to x{25/50}%.
legendary_necro_119.name: Cadaverous

legendary_necro_120.desc: Consuming a Corpse has a {20/30}% chance to spawn a Blood Orb.
legendary_necro_120.name: of the Embalmer

ParagonGlyph_060.desc: For every 5 Dexterity purchased within range, Skeletal Warriors deal +{4/4.8/5.6/6.4/7.2/8/8.8/9.6/10.4/11.2/12/12.8/13.6/14.4/15.2/16/16.8/17.6/18.4/19.2}% increased damage.

ParagonGlyph_062.bonus: You deal x2% increased damage, up to x12%, for every Close Corpse.

ParagonGlyph_066.bonus: Critical Strikes deal x22% increased damage to enemies that are not Healthy.
ParagonGlyph_066.desc: For every 5 Dexterity purchased within range, Core Skills deal +{4/4.8/5.6/6.4/7.2/8/8.8/9.6/10.4/11.2/12/12.8/13.6/14.4/15.2/16/16.8/17.6/18.4/19.2}% increased Critical Strike Damage.

ParagonGlyph_070.bonus: Blood Orbs Fortify you for 6.7% of your Maximum Life.

ParagonGlyph_071.bonus: Whenever your Minions deal damage to an enemy, that enemy takes x1% increased damage from you and your Minions, up to x12%, for 10 seconds.

ParagonGlyph_074.bonus: Golems gain x25% increased Maximum Life.
ParagonGlyph_074.desc: For every 5 Willpower purchased within range, Golems gain +{4/4.8/5.6/6.4/7.2/8/8.8/9.6/10.4/11.2/12/12.8/13.6/14.4/15.2/16/16.8/17.6/18.4/19.2}% increased damage.

ParagonGlyph_078.bonus: Whenever you or your Minions deal Shadow damage to an enemy, that enemy deals 2% reduced damage, up to 10%, for 5 seconds.
ParagonGlyph_078.desc: For every 5 Willpower purchased within range, you deal +{2/2.4/2.8/3.2/3.6/4/4.4/4.8/5.2/5.6/6/6.4/6.8/7.2/7.6/8/8.4/8.8/9.2/9.6}% increased Shadow damage.

ParagonGlyph_079.bonus: Dealing damage to a Vulnerable enemy increases your damage by x1% for 6 seconds, up to x10%.
ParagonGlyph_079.desc: For every 5 Dexterity purchased within range, you deal +{2/2.4/2.8/3.2/3.6/4/4.4/4.8/5.2/5.6/6/6.4/6.8/7.2/7.6/8/8.4/8.8/9.2/9.6}% increased damage to Vulnerable targets.

Necromancer_Legendary_001.desc: Your Minions deal x10% increased damage for each Minion type you have active. This only applies to the Minion types: Skeletal Warrior, Skeletal Mage, and Golem.
Necromancer_Legendary_001.name: Cult Leader

Necromancer_Legendary_002.desc: Lucky Hit: Your Minions have a 10% chance to grant you a Barrier for 6% of your Maximum Life for 5 seconds.

Necromancer_Legendary_003.desc: When your Minions die, they explode and deal 30% of their Maximum Life as Shadow damage to surrounding enemies.

Necromancer_Legendary_004.desc: Your Minions have 25% less Maximum Life but deal x45% increased damage.

Necromancer_Legendary_005.desc: Your Golem has x30% increased Maximum Life and deals x30% increased damage.
Necromancer_Legendary_005.name: Hulking Monstrosity

Necromancer_Legendary_006.desc: Consuming a Corpse Slows enemies around it by 30% for 6 seconds. Your Corpse Skills deal x30% increased damage to Crowd Controlled enemies.

Necromancer_Legendary_007.desc: With at least 2 Corpses Nearby, you gain 15% Damage Reduction. With no Corpses Nearby, you deal x15% increased damage.
Necromancer_Legendary_007.name: Scent of Death

Necromancer_Legendary_008.desc: Consuming 5 Corpses grants x40% increased damage for 6 seconds.
Necromancer_Legendary_008.name: Flesh-eater

Necromancer_Legendary_009.desc: When your Minion is killed, it has a 50% chance to leave a Corpse.

Necromancer_Legendary_010.desc: Attacks that are guaranteed to Overpower deal x50% increased Overpower damage.
Necromancer_Legendary_010.name: Bloodbath

Necromancer_Legendary_011.desc: Blood Orbs grant x5% increased damage, up to x15%, for 5 seconds.
Necromancer_Legendary_011.name: Blood Begets Blood

Necromancer_Legendary_012.desc: Blood Orbs also restore 35 Essence when picked up.

Necromancer_Legendary_013.desc: Bone Skills grant you 9% damage reduction, up to 45%, for the next 5 seconds.

Necromancer_Legendary_014.desc: Lucky Hit: Your Bone Skills have a 50% chance to make enemies Vulnerable for 2 seconds.

Necromancer_Legendary_015.desc: Whenever you consume a Corpse, a Bone Spirit is spawned at its location.

Necromancer_Legendary_016.desc: Your Shadow damage over time effects have a x5% chance to deal x50% bonus damage each time they deal damage. This chance is increased by x1% and bonus damage is increased by x2.5% for each 50 Willpower you have.
Necromancer_Legendary_016.name: Wither

Necromancer_Legendary_017.desc: Hitting enemies with Bone Skills increases your damage by x1% and your Maximum Essence by 3 for 8 seconds, stacks up to x7.5% increased damage and 22.5 Maximum Essence.
Necromancer_Legendary_017.name: Bone Graft

Necromancer_Magic_ArmorWithActiveGolem.name: Armor With Active Golem

1HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.desc: Corpse Explosion consumes up to 4.0 additional Corpses around the initial Corpse, dealing x{122/130}% increased damage and with a {21/25}% larger radius per additional Corpse.
1HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"The scrolls describe a river of tar that separated the living from the land of the dead. Any unfortunate soul who tried to cross would be dragged down into oblivion."
- Notes of Scholar Kamien
1HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.name: Black River

2HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.desc:
Your Darkness Skills Chill enemies for up to 40.0%.

Lucky Hit: Your Darkness Skills have up to a 100.0% chance to generate {2/5} additional Essence against Frozen targets.
2HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"My companion swung her odd weapon in a wide arc, and our pursuer stopped short. The look of horror on his face as his body fell to pieces will haunt me forever."
- The Ebon Pages, Canto II, Verse XI
2HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.name: Bloodless Scream

Amulet_Unique_Necro_100.desc: Blood Surge casts a mini nova on your Minions, dealing {50/75} damage. Damage is increased by 10.0% per target drained by the initial cast, up to 50.0%.
Amulet_Unique_Necro_100.flavor: Once a sanctum for Rathma's studies, the Temple of the Deathspeaker became a proving grounds for potential leaders of his priesthood. Its halls are filled with the corpses of those who failed.
Amulet_Unique_Necro_100.name: Deathspeaker's Pendant

Boots_Unique_Necro_100.desc: Create desecrated ground beneath your Sever spectres as they travel, damaging enemies for {150/210} Shadow damage over 2.0 seconds.
Boots_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"The massive door to my family's crypt, which had taken a dozen men to close, was thrown open. Had I known the horrors to come I never would have set foot inside!"
-The Ebon Pages, Canto I, Verse VII
Boots_Unique_Necro_100.name: Greaves of the Empty Tomb

Chest_Unique_Necro_101.desc: When you pick up {5/10} Blood Orbs, a free Bone Spirit is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current Life percent.
Chest_Unique_Necro_101.flavor:
"The infamous Necromancer Gaza-Thul's mastery over blood magic was indisputable. Many suspect that upon his death, his skin was used to fashion this eldritch armor."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Chest_Unique_Necro_101.name: Blood Artisan's Cuirass

Gloves_Unique_Necro_100.desc: Instead of detonating immediately, Corpse Explosion summons a Volatile Skeleton that charges at a random enemy and explodes. Corpse Explosion's damage is increased by x{30/40}%.
Gloves_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"Can you not hear it? That endless scream from the cold earth beneath your feet!? They are down there, trapped, blind with rage! Waiting to drag us down into the sod!"
- Ravings of Madman Gustav
Gloves_Unique_Necro_100.name: Howl from Below

Helm_Unique_Necro_100.desc: Bone Spear leaves behind echoes as it travels that explode, dealing {125/175} damage.
Helm_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"Rathma is endless. He was the first Ancient, and will remain at the end. He is the master of the Great Cycle of Being. When Death comes for him, why should he fear it?"
- Vauntus, Acolyte of Rathma
Helm_Unique_Necro_100.name: Deathless Visage

Ring_Unique_Necro_100.desc:
While you have 7.0 or more Minions you gain:
• Lucky Hit: Up to a 10.0% chance to empower all of your Minions, causing the next attack from each to explode for {1500/2000} Physical damage.
Ring_Unique_Necro_100.flavor: The signet of Mendeln ul-Diomed, the founder of the Priests of Rathma and the first Necromancer, was lost for over 3,000 years. The immense power over death held within, however, has not diminished.
Ring_Unique_Necro_100.name: Ring of Mendeln

Legendary_Rogue_124.desc: Rapid Fire has a {15/30}% chance to ricochet to another target.
Legendary_Rogue_124.name: Repeating

Legendary_Rogue_125.desc: Each Chilled or Frozen enemy you Evade through grants you a Barrier that absorbs {25/50} damage for 5.0 seconds, absorbing up to a maximum of {125/250} damage.
Legendary_Rogue_125.name: Snap Frozen

legendary_rogue_003.desc:
Your Shadow Clones also mimic the Imbuements applied to your Skills.

legendary_rogue_011.desc: Flurry damages enemies in a circle around you and deals x{8/15}% increased damage.

legendary_rogue_013.desc: When a Dark Shroud shadow would be removed you trigger an explosion around yourself that deals {54/97} Shadow damage.

legendary_rogue_014.desc: Damaging an Elite enemy with a Basic Skill generates {5/8} Energy.

legendary_rogue_018.desc: When you Evade or Shadow Step, you leave behind a cluster of exploding Stun Grenades that deal {50/100} total Physical damage and Stun enemies for 0.5 seconds.

legendary_rogue_019.desc: Caltrops also throw a cluster of exploding Stun Grenades that deal {100/150} total Physical damage and Stun enemies for 0.5 seconds.

legendary_rogue_021.desc: Twisting Blades orbit for a short time after they return to you, dealing {10/20}% of Twisting Blades' return damage per hit. Based on the distance the blades returned, the orbit damage increases up to {20/40}% of the return damage.
legendary_rogue_021.name: Bladedancer's

legendary_rogue_023.name: Toxic Alchemist's

legendary_rogue_024.desc: Lucky Hit: Damaging a Chilled or Frozen enemy with a Shadow Imbued Skill has up to a 75.0% chance to release an explosion that deals {110/200} Cold damage to the target and surrounding enemies, Chilling them for 15.0%.
legendary_rogue_024.name: Icy Alchemist's

legendary_rogue_026.desc: When you cast Dash, a Shadow Clone is spawned at your location that also casts Dash, dealing {25/35}% of the Base damage.

legendary_rogue_028.desc: Lucky Hit: Your Marksman Skills have up to a 10.0% chance to create an arrow storm at the enemy's location, dealing {540/675} Physical damage over 3.0 seconds. You can have up to 5.0 active arrow storms.
legendary_rogue_028.name: of Arrow Storms

legendary_rogue_029.desc: Lucky Hit: Critical Strikes with Poison Imbued Skills have up to a 10.0% chance to create a toxic pool that deals {540/675} Poisoning damage over 3.0 seconds to enemies within. While standing in the pool Poison Imbuement has no Cooldown and no Charge limit.
legendary_rogue_029.name: of Bursting Venoms

legendary_rogue_100.desc: Barrage's arrows have a {15/25}% chance to split into 2 arrows whenever they ricochet.
legendary_rogue_100.name: of Branching Volleys

legendary_rogue_101.desc: Lucky Hit: Dealing direct damage to enemies affected by your Trap Skills has up to a {30/50}% chance to make them Vulnerable for 3.0 seconds.

legendary_rogue_103.name: of Uncanny Treachery

legendary_rogue_104.desc: Explosions from the Victimize Key Passive Heal you for {25/45} Life for each enemy damaged, up to a maximum of {75/135} Life.

legendary_rogue_106.desc: Killing a Vulnerable enemy grants you x{50/70}% increased Energy Regeneration for 4.0 seconds.

legendary_rogue_109.desc: When you break Stealth with an attack, you drop a cluster of exploding Stun Grenades around your location that deal {360/450} total Physical damage and Stun enemies for 0.5 seconds.

legendary_rogue_110.desc: You automatically drop a Smoke Grenade at the end of Dash. Dash's Cooldown is reduced by {0.25/0.35} seconds for each enemy Dazed this way, up to {0.75/1.05} seconds.

legendary_rogue_111.desc: You take {15/25}% less damage from Crowd Controlled enemies. Whenever a Crowd Controlled enemy deals direct damage to you, gain +15.0% Movement Speed for 2.0 seconds.

legendary_rogue_112.desc: Lucky Hit: Damaging a Vulnerable enemy with a Core Skill has up to a {10/20}% chance to drop a Healing Potion.

legendary_rogue_113.desc: Your Imbuement Skill effects have x{20/40}% increased potency against Vulnerable enemies.

legendary_rogue_114.desc: Lucky Hit: Dealing direct damage to a Vulnerable enemy has up to a {25/45}% chance to Daze them for 2.0 seconds.

legendary_rogue_116.desc: Lucky Hit: Critical Strikes with Marksman Skills have up to a {30/50}% chance to grant a free Dark Shroud shadow.

legendary_rogue_117.desc: Chilled enemies Poisoned by Poison Imbuement will be further Chilled for 20% per second. You deal x{10/25}% additional Poison damage to Frozen enemies.

legendary_rogue_118.desc: Shadow Step has an additional Charge. Killing an enemy with Shadow Step refunds a Charge and increases the damage of Shadow Step by x{1/6}% for 2.0 seconds, up to x{5/30}%.

legendary_rogue_119.desc: Using an Agility Skill reduces the Cooldown of your next Subterfuge Skill by 20%. Using a Subterfuge Skill increases the damage of your next Agility Skill by x{10/30}%.

legendary_rogue_120.desc: Evading through an enemy infected by Shadow Imbuement grants Stealth for 4.0 seconds. Breaking Stealth with an attack grants you {1/5}% Maximum Life on Kill for 4.0 seconds.
legendary_rogue_120.name: of Lethal Dusk

legendary_rogue_121.desc: While you have both bonuses from the Close Quarters Combat Key Passive active, your Dodge Chance increases by +{1/5}% whenever you're hit by a Close enemy. Successfully Dodging resets this bonus.
legendary_rogue_121.name: of Elusive Menace

legendary_rogue_122.desc: Poison Trap no longer breaks Stealth and triggers no Cooldown or arm time while you are in Stealth. All Poison Traps activate when you exit Stealth and Poison Trap's Cooldown will be {5/8} seconds per trap placed.
legendary_rogue_122.name: Infiltrator's

legendary_rogue_123.desc: Chilled enemies hit by your Grenade Skills have a chance equal to double your Critical Strike Chance to be instantly Frozen for 2.0 seconds. You deal x{10/25}% increased Critical Strike Damage against Frozen enemies.
legendary_rogue_123.name: Frostbitten

ParagonGlyph_014.bonus: You gain 12% Damage Reduction against Close enemies.

ParagonGlyph_045.name: Bane

ParagonGlyph_048.bonus: Poisoning damage effects last x33.3% longer.

ParagonGlyph_052.bonus: Non-Basic and Non-Core Skills deal x15% increased damage.

ParagonGlyph_054.bonus: While wielding a Ranged weapon, you take 10% reduced damage.

Critically Striking an enemy grants +{5/10/15/20/25/30/35/40/45/50}% Movement Speed for 4.0 seconds.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Vanish from sight, gaining an advanced form of Stealth for 4 seconds that will not be removed by taking damage.

Concealment also makes you Unstoppable, grants +25% Movement Speed, and allows you to move freely through enemies for its duration.

Using an attack Skill during Concealment will break Concealment.

1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_001.desc: Your Core Skills deal x{20/40}% increased damage when spending 3 Combo Points. Your Basic Skills using this weapon have a 30% chance to generate 3 Combo Points.
1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_001.flavor:
"I've never seen such ruthless butchery. He deserves to be be shipped off to die in the swamps with the rest of the godless murderers."
- Witness to the murder of Sergeant Walcot
1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_001.name: Condemnation

1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_002.desc: Hits with this weapon increase your Attack Speed by +{4/6}% for 4.0 seconds, up to +{20/30}%.
1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_002.flavor: When Caldeum's gates closed, Asheara led her Iron Wolves out of the city knowing full well they would never return. Instead they roamed Kehjistan pledging their blades to any who were in need.
1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_002.name: Asheara's Khanjar

2HBow_Unique_Rogue_001.desc: The first direct damage you deal to an enemy is a guaranteed Critical Strike. If you had maximum stacks of the Precision Key Passive when you cast the Skill, gain {15/25} Energy, this can only happen once per cast.
2HBow_Unique_Rogue_001.flavor:
"Genai took up her bow and aimed at the sun itself. The light burned her eyes, but her arrow flew true. Wounded, the sun hid, and brought forth the first night.
- Fable of the Great Sky-Hunt
2HBow_Unique_Rogue_001.name: Skyhunter

2HBow_Unique_Rogue_006.desc: Lucky Hit: Hits with this weapon have up to a {10/20}% chance to deal double damage and Knock Back the target.
2HBow_Unique_Rogue_006.flavor:
"There have been numerous world-shaping conflicts throughout history. This bow has been found on the battlefield of every one, and always in the hands of the victors."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
2HBow_Unique_Rogue_006.name: Windforce

Amulet_Unique_Rogue_100.desc: Your Rain of Arrows is always Imbued with all Imbuements at once.
Amulet_Unique_Rogue_100.flavor:
"Let the great gates of Caldeum be sealed. Let its proud walls stand fiercely defended. The rest of Kehjistan may suffer this plague, but my city, and my people, will not."
- Proclamation of Hakan II
Amulet_Unique_Rogue_100.name: Word of Hakan

Gloves_Unique_Rogue_100.desc: Lucky Hit: Damaging a Vulnerable enemy with a Marksman or Cutthroat Skill has up to a {20/30}% chance to summon a Shadow Clone that mimics your attack.
Gloves_Unique_Rogue_100.flavor: Dark wisps creep hungrily across these gloves, like an assassin's blade seeking a life to steal on a moonless night.
Gloves_Unique_Rogue_100.name: Grasp of Shadow

Helm_Unique_Rogue_001.desc: You gain x{15/25}% increased Lucky Hit Chance against Crowd Controlled enemies.
Helm_Unique_Rogue_001.flavor:
"He is banished from the Guild, his name stricken from the Book. His punishment is to never have been." 
- Excerpt from a burned parchment
Helm_Unique_Rogue_001.name: Cowl of the Nameless

Pants_Unique_Rogue_004.desc: Unless it hits a Boss or Player, Death Trap will continue to re-arm itself until it kills an enemy. However, Death Trap's Cooldown is increased by {15/30}%.
Pants_Unique_Rogue_004.flavor:
"And so, when the sun dipped behind the hills each night, he knew that Ashen Jack would soon be near. Watching, and waiting."
- Greenslade's Tales, Chapter 2: "Each Long Night"
Pants_Unique_Rogue_004.name: Eyes in the Dark

Sorcerer_Enchantment_ArcLash.desc: When you use a Cooldown, enemies around you are Stunned for {0.5/0.55/0.6/0.65/0.7/0.75/0.8/0.85/0.9/0.95} seconds.

Sorcerer_Enchantment_Teleport_Active.desc: Teleport description here - since this is a skill that replaces your Evade button, you should never see this.

1HWand_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: While Channeling Incinerate, you periodically shoot embers that are attracted to enemies, each dealing {50/100} Fire damage.
1HWand_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor: The burn may heal, but the pain is eternal.
1HWand_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Flamescar

2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_002.desc: Every 3rd cast of Fireball launches 2 additional projectiles.
2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_002.flavor:
"Leaving even blackened bones for your kin to mourn is too good an end for you." 
- Josiah
2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_002.name: Staff of Endless Rage

2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: Charged Bolts pierce, but deal x{30/40}% less damage.
2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor:
"Also known as the Greatstaff of the Old Religion, this powerful relic is one of only a small handful of Skatsimi artifacts that have survived to this day."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Staff of Lam Esen

Amulet_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: Upon collecting Crackling Energy, there's a 10.0% chance to release a lightning nova, dealing {155/200} Lightning Damage.
Amulet_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor: The only thing more potent than Esadora's magic was her endless hatred of humanity. As she lay dying, the pale amulet around her neck drank in both.
Amulet_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Esadora's Overflowing Cameo

Boots_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by {15/25}% of your Movement Speed bonus.
Boots_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor:
"While scholars have proven these boots were not created by Esu herself, it is noteworthy that they have been passed down since the formation of the Mage Clans."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Boots_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Esu's Heirloom

Chest_Unique_Sorc_002.desc: After using Teleport, Close enemies are Pulled to you and Stunned for {2/3} seconds, but Teleport's Cooldown is increased by x20.0%.
Chest_Unique_Sorc_002.flavor: The power you have is never enough.
Chest_Unique_Sorc_002.name: Raiment of the Infinite

Gloves_Unique_Sorc_002.desc: Fireball now bounces as it travels, exploding each time it hits the ground, but its explosion deals {65/75}% less damage.
Gloves_Unique_Sorc_002.flavor: After Inarius returned to Sanctuary, he sought a way back to the High Heavens. His first step was to reignite the religion he had abandoned millennia before: the Cathedral of Light.
Gloves_Unique_Sorc_002.name: Gloves of the Illuminator

Pants_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: Enemies that die while Frozen have a {11/20}% chance to unleash a Frost Nova.
Pants_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor: The mad artisan saw his fingers turn black from frostbite as he worked the cloth, but refused to stay the needle and thread for even a moment.
Pants_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Iceheart Brais
